columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the resource.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The ID of the resource.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: Provisioning state of the namespace.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: The time the namespace was created.

columns.name: cluster_arm_id
columns.description: Cluster ARM ID of the namespace.

columns.name: is_auto_inflate_enabled
columns.description: Indicates whether auto-inflate is enabled for eventhub namespace.

columns.name: kafka_enabled
columns.description: Indicates whether kafka is enabled for eventhub namespace, or not.

columns.name: maximum_throughput_units
columns.description: Upper limit of throughput units when auto-inflate is enabled, value should be within 0 to 20 throughput units.

columns.name: metric_id
columns.description: Identifier for azure insights metrics.

columns.name: service_bus_endpoint
columns.description: Endpoint you can use to perform service bus operations.

columns.name: sku_capacity
columns.description: The Event Hubs throughput units, value should be 0 to 20 throughput units.

columns.name: sku_name
columns.description: Name of this SKU. Possible values include: 'Basic', 'Standard'.

columns.name: sku_tier
columns.description: The billing tier of this particular SKU. Valid values are: 'Basic', 'Standard', 'Premium'.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: The time the namespace was updated.

columns.name: zone_redundant
columns.description: Enabling this property creates a standard event hubs namespace in regions supported availability zones.

columns.name: diagnostic_settings
columns.description: A list of active diagnostic settings for the eventhub namespace.

columns.name: encryption
columns.description: Properties of BYOK encryption description.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: Describes the properties of BYOK encryption description.

columns.name: network_rule_set
columns.description: Describes the network rule set for specified namespace. The EventHub Namespace must be Premium in order to attach a EventHub Namespace Network Rule Set.

columns.name: private_endpoint_connections
columns.description: The private endpoint connections of the namespace.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
